title: Data Center Consolidation and Migration Planning
description: Plan and execute migration from National Mutual's Chicago colocation facilities to Atlantic International's distributed DC footprint. Includes lease termination, equipment migration, and network reconfiguration.

title: AWS to Azure Cloud Migration
description: Migrate National Mutual's AWS workloads (41 accounts, $3.4M annual spend) to Atlantic International's Azure environment. Includes service mapping, data migration, network reconfiguration, and application testing.

title: Backup and DR Platform Consolidation
description: Migrate from National Mutual's Veeam/Zerto backup solution to Atlantic International's Commvault/Dell Data Protection platform. Includes data migration, policy reconfiguration, and DR testing.

title: Infrastructure Discovery and Assessment
description: Comprehensive technical assessment of National Mutual's infrastructure including server inventory, storage systems, network architecture, and application dependencies. Foundation for all migration planning.

title: Network Discovery and Documentation
description: Comprehensive discovery of National Mutual's network infrastructure including WAN topology, IP addressing, VLAN structure, firewall configurations, and network equipment inventory across all 12 locations and 2 data centers

title: IP Address Conflict Analysis and Remediation Planning
description: Analyze IP addressing schemes of both companies, identify conflicts, and develop remediation plan including IP renumbering strategy, NAT implementation, or network segmentation approach

title: Day 1 Network Connectivity Setup
description: Establish secure network connectivity between National Mutual and Atlantic International networks for Day 1 operations, including VPN setup, firewall rule configuration, and DNS resolution

title: WAN Architecture Integration
description: Integrate National Mutual's 12 locations into Atlantic International's WAN architecture, including circuit evaluation, SD-WAN extension or MPLS integration, and redundancy planning

title: Data Center Network Migration
description: Migrate National Mutual's Chicago data center networks to integrate with Atlantic International's multi-DC architecture, including network equipment migration, VLAN restructuring, and connectivity updates

title: DNS and DHCP Integration
description: Integrate DNS and DHCP services, resolve namespace conflicts, migrate to buyer's DNS architecture, and ensure proper name resolution across integrated network

title: Comprehensive Security Assessment
description: Conduct thorough security assessment including penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and security architecture review to establish baseline security posture and identify critical vulnerabilities

title: Identity and Access Management Integration
description: Integrate National Mutual's Microsoft Entra ID with buyer's identity systems, migrate user accounts, implement unified MFA, and establish privileged access management across combined environment

title: SIEM Migration and Security Operations Integration
description: Migrate from IBM QRadar to Microsoft Sentinel, rebuild detection rules and playbooks, integrate with buyer's SOC operations, and ensure continuous security monitoring throughout transition

title: Endpoint Security Platform Migration
description: Migrate from CrowdStrike to Carbon Black across 1,800+ endpoints, ensuring no security coverage gaps during transition, and integrate with buyer's endpoint management processes

title: Compliance Assessment and Remediation
description: Assess current compliance posture against required frameworks (SOC 2, PCI DSS), identify gaps, and implement remediation measures to maintain certifications post-acquisition

title: Data Security and Encryption Assessment
description: Conduct comprehensive assessment of data classification, encryption implementation (at rest and in transit), DLP controls, and data handling procedures to ensure regulatory compliance and data protection

title: Integration Program Management Office (PMO) Establishment
description: Establish dedicated PMO to coordinate cross-domain dependencies, manage critical path, and ensure proper sequencing of network discovery, identity integration, and infrastructure migration activities. Include specialized insurance industry expertise for Guidewire/Duck Creek migrations.

title: Pre-Close Technical Due Diligence Deep Dive
description: Conduct comprehensive technical assessment to fill critical gaps in network architecture, infrastructure inventory, and security posture. Must complete before close to validate integration timeline and cost estimates.
